name: Tatzlwyrm Rake
description: You can immobilize your foe without using your arms.
prerequisites: Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Tatzlwyrm Claw Style, Tatzlwyrm Grappler, Escape Artist 8 ranks
benefit: While using the Tatzlwyrm Style feat, you can attempt a combat maneuver check to maintain a grapple without using your arms. You must use at least two limbs in order to do this, and if you use all your legs, you canâ€™t take any movement while maintaining the grapple. If your combat maneuver check succeeds by 10 or more, you are able to make a single unarmed attack against the target of the grapple as a swift action.
